text: "Yaari Hai" () is a song by Tony Kakkar. It was released as a single on 3 August 2019 by Desi Music Factory. The song received over 100 million views on YouTube in November 2019. == References == == External links == * * Yaari Hai on Gaana.com * Category:2019 singles Category:Tony Kakkar songs Category:Hindi songs
title: Yaari Hai
